itemInfo.itemDesc:
Well made fish filet soup. 
- Unique effect: Critical Hit Rate +1 for 75min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Cream
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be created by Shaking sugar with the milk obtained from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fruit Pie, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Mudskipper
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Fried Fish, Steamed Fish, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Wheat Flour
item.desc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Wheat.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Cream
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be created by Shaking sugar with the milk obtained from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fruit Pie, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\nâ€» Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.
